attributes.action: Stop Sex Education in Schools to kids below 16 Years Old Kids
attributes.background: Sex Education in schools for anyone below 16Years old is wrong and its like stealing their innocence. Basic sex education about wrong touch etc is fine and is essential but detailed Sex Education like Homosexuality, Writing Love letters is wrong and should not be taught to anyone below 16 Years Old.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure exactly what sorts of education you want to stop.

You might want to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235053
